Developer Guide
===============

This section provides comprehensive documentation for developers who want to contribute to PhenoScope or extend its functionality.

.. note::
   The Developer Guide is currently under development. The following sections will be available soon.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Developer Guide Topics

   architecture
   contributing
   extending
   testing
   documentation

Placeholder Pages
-----------------

**Architecture Overview** (Coming Soon)
   An overview of PhenoScope's architecture, design patterns, and core components.

**Contributing Guidelines** (Coming Soon)
   Learn how to contribute to PhenoScope, including coding standards, pull request workflow, and issue reporting.

**Extending PhenoScope** (Coming Soon)
   Detailed guides on how to create custom modules, pipelines, and integrations with PhenoScope.

**Testing Framework** (Coming Soon)
   Information about PhenoScope's testing infrastructure and how to write effective tests.

**Documentation Guide** (Coming Soon)
   Guidelines for writing and maintaining PhenoScope's documentation.
